com.infinum.selection.service

Class CredentialsService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.infinum.selection.service.CredentialsService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICredentialsService

    @Service
public class CredentialsService
extends java.lang.Object
implements ICredentialsService
    Service class containing logic for validation of user credentials (email address and password) used for user registration.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CredentialsService() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void checkEmailValidity(java.lang.String email)
      Checking if provided email address have valid format - user@domain.com
      For email address to be valid it must consist of three parts: local part, at sign and domain part.
      void checkPasswordValidity(java.lang.String password)
      Checking if provided password have valid format - must be at least 8 characters long and must have at least one digit.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • checkEmailValidity

        public void checkEmailValidity(java.lang.String email)
        Description copied from interface: ICredentialsService
        Checking if provided email address have valid format - user@domain.com
        For email address to be valid it must consist of three parts: local part, at sign and domain part. All three parts must be present and in the above mentioned order.
        Specified by:
        checkEmailValidity in interface ICredentialsService
        Parameters:
        email - provided email address

      • checkPasswordValidity

        public void checkPasswordValidity(java.lang.String password)
        Description copied from interface: ICredentialsService
        Checking if provided password have valid format - must be at least 8 characters long and must have at least one digit.
        Specified by:
        checkPasswordValidity in interface ICredentialsService
        Parameters:
        password - provided password
